# Question 1

# Question 1.1
```{r include=TRUE, results='asis'}
library(ggfortify) # so we can use fortify to create a datatable and out put summary in a prettier format
trialA <- q1dat %>% filter(drug == "A")
trialB <- q1dat %>% filter(drug == "B")

trialA.sv <- Surv(time=trialA$time, event=trialA$status, type="right")
trialASurv <- survfit(trialA.sv ~ 1, data = trialA)
tableA <- fortify(trialASurv)
print(knitr::kable(tableA))

trialB.sv <- Surv(time=trialB$time, event=trialB$status, type="right")
trialBSurv <- survfit(trialB.sv ~ 1, data = trialB)
tableB <- fortify(trialBSurv)
print(knitr::kable(tableB))

plotA <- plot(trialASurv, xlab ="months", ylab = "probablity of survival", main = "Kaplan-Meier  plot of trial A drug" )
plotB <- plot(trialBSurv, xlab ="months", ylab = "probablity of survival", main = "Kaplan-Meier  plot of trial B drug" )

#knitr::kable(list(tableA, tableB))
```
